title: Bouken Yuuki Pluster World (Adventure Hero Pluster World)
synopsis: Sent to a strange world, a young boy must team up with monsters, becoming one with them to battle evil.
staff: [['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Tomita, Sukehiro', ['Script']], ['Nanba, Hitoshi', ['Storyboard']], ['Katsu, Seiji', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Composition']]]
